website_summaries.verdict: This is an easy and lightweight stroller that folds flat, but still allows you to click in an infant seat.
cons: At 17 pounds, this is not the lightest Graco stroller on the market

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stroller
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this stroller, it feels more firm than the other bigger stroller we had, my 1 year old seems to be very comfortable in it. On our other stroller my son seemed to slide down and would end up kind of hunched. But this stroller gives him some good support. It's fairly light, super easy to fold, it has a carrying handle, and folds down smaller than what we had, so I there's more space in trunk. The ONLY thing that I wish was better, but I think its not a big enough deal to deduct a star, the canopy is a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: Oh, how I love this stroller! I had never seen an umbrella stroller that would accept the Click Connect car seat, so I had to try this. The basket is super roomy (when you don't have the seat connected), and I love the quick release straps for baby. The side cup holder is really nice, though it gets in the way every once in a while. It's easy to fold, easy to store, and light to carry. Baby is only 10 months old now, but we'll be using this for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Schep

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, it is so light compared to the standar ones. Also clic and connects with Graco car seat witch helped me many times when my son got asleep in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Aradan

customer_reviews.title: Better then any travel system out there !
customer_reviews.text: I bought the breaze and click connect matching car seat to use as a "travel system " , its so light and easy to open and close with or without use of the carseat. If your a mom on the go like myself and you live in a area where you depend on bus and train like i do because i live in newyork city this is absolutely perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product that my son and his wife enjoyed while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open and close
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open and close. Pretty long when folded up, Simple to insert infant car seat once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was expensive for a lightweight stroller but after using this for several months it has exceeded my expectations! It is lightweight, easy to open and close, compact, and we love that pattern! I also love that it accepts click connect car seats. We have a jogger and now this stroller and they are perfect! I would definitely buy this again. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because a bigger child may have a hard time with the footrest being so high. Seriously, but this, it's way better than those cheaper bulkier strollers and graco is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our son and daughter-in-law have been very pleased with the stroller and judging from the contented smile ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son and daughter-in-law have been very pleased with the stroller and judging from the contented smile of their new baby boy he very much enjoys it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the click-connect system and this was perfect for Gma to have as a small alternative. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: P. Ketring

customer_reviews.title: Love all the features
customer_reviews.text: Love all the features! Lays flat, car seat attaches. Just would add a parent caddy, kid snack tray, and make the foot rest for child lower (for some wierd reason it's only 2" below the seat). Other wise I love how it's an umbrella stroller and small and light that I can travel with and take to beach.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Bridget

customer_reviews.title: The fact that the car seat clicks right in is amazing and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a lifesaver! I have a double stroller but was looking for something to put my newborn in when it was just the two of us. The fact that the car seat clicks right in is amazing and so easy to use! I would give it 6 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller! It rolls and steers like a dream. Best purchase I've made! Our car seat clicks right in with no problem, the extended hood goes over and protects from the sun. Great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Dis Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: very good comfortable, real easy not so lightweight. Has one small problem the locks are to far out lock in sometimes when you go with stairs, otherwise it a great baby carriage.
customer_reviews.author: vrap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go moms and I love that ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on the go moms and I love that I can use the click connect infant car seat with this stroller. It's easy to fold and it's not bulky like the regular travel system strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Super easy and met all our expectations. Perfect for the city, mall or stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is my great. I use it all the time with my son. It has plenty of room for storage and is comfortable for my son. It folds up well and takes up minimal space. The stroller is easy to fold and unfold. It can be folded and unfolded with one hand but it is easier with two. This stroller was an excellent purchase and goes along with the other Graco one click products I have purchased
customer_reviews.author: JEFF K

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Easy to steer with one hand
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to steer with one hand, is also easy to fold and unfold with one hand. The fact that it lays flat with an adjustable foot rest makes this perfect for extended walks that involve errands with multiple stops. Holds up well with daily use in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Sharri Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome as a travel system
customer_reviews.text: Stroller was exactly what it said it would be. Works awesome as a travel system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stroller! Bought for my three mos old gbaby. Fits nicely with her infant car seat. BEST feature is it fits in the trunk of my small car, Chevy sonic RS. :-)
customer_reviews.author: L Seymour

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller. We have a BOB but it isn't always the most convenient for traveling. This stroller is just slightly bigger than an umbrella stroller but by allowing the infant car seat to be attached you have created an easy to travel with stroller. I took this stroller on a plane trip with my two month old by myself. It was perfect. The canopy portion is also very large and covered a good portion of the car seat. It locks into place and can withstand a good wind.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: i love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: i love this stroller! i did alot of research before i bought one and im so glad i went with this one. just wish it had a removable tray for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: ShyAnne

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is pretty great so far
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is pretty great so far. It opens easily and closes up nicely as not to take up much room in the back of my van. Our 3 year old has enjoyed sitting in it. We will be using the stroller with an infant car seat when our baby is born in April. There are a few steps to get the stroller set up for holding the infant car seat but it doesn't take long. Pros: compact, sturdy, easy to steer, comfortable seat, big basket underneath Cons: basket is nearly unusable when infant car seat is attached because the seat back has to be reclined so far
customer_reviews.author: Allison Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Too small for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this stroller but it was just too small for my two year old. Our regular stroller broke and I needed a quick lightweight replacement so I purchased this because the weight limit is so high. My son is two months shy of 3 years old and his head was way higher then the top of the back and he was very uncomfortable trying to find a place for his feet. He's by no means a large kiddo, but he is rather tall. We ended up returning as it was just way too small and uncomfortable for my kiddo. It was comfortable to push and seemed to have a nice ride though.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2014 model, not 2015.  This should be model #1934718
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift for my new baby. It's a lightweight great stroller. BUT... Amazon, this is NOT a 2015 model. The 1906606 is a 2014 model. I was concerned that this item was recalled because other 2014 models of this Breaze were recalled due to fingers being cut off and such. This one does not seem affected though. This isn't the 2015 though, look at the manufacturer paper that comes on it.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

product_meta.title: Graco Breaze Click Connect Stroller, Pierce
product_meta.description:
Color:PierceGraco's Breaze Click Connect, in Pierce, is the easiest folding umbrella stroller available, thanks to its innovative one-hand fold (moms like you love this feature. ). Breaze accepts all Graco Click Connect infant car seats, and it holds a child from birth up to 50 pound, for years of use. An extra-large canopy with UV 50 protection and a pop-out visor offers shade from the sun, and the adjustable calf support keeps baby comfortable. Breaze features lockable front-swivel wheels with suspension and, once folded, it automatically locks and has a carry strap. Really, everything about this umbrella stroller is easy and convenient. A removable parent cup holder and easy-access, extra-large storage basket make this a full-featured stroller without compromise.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Holds a children up to 50 pound for years of comfortable strolling
Deluxe padded seat with a multi-position, flat recline for a comfy ride
Extra-large canopy with a visor extension and peek-a-boo window plus UV 50+ protection
Exclusive one-hand fold makes this the easiest folding umbrella stroller
Easily accepts all Graco Click Connect infant car seats with a secure one-step attachment to create your own travel system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars40 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
